definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קהל]] (√ of following; cf. Sab. [[קהל]], [[קהלת]] assembly, congregation DHM:ZMG xxx (1876), 685 Hom:Chrest. 127; Saho kahal, come together, assemble Reinisch:Saho Spr. 210; Syr. qhal assemble, ChrPal. qhl0, lao/v; NH Hiph. = BH; Lag:BN 51 cp. Ar. qahala rebuke, and conj. [[קָהָל]] = ‘Rügegericht’).
